alerts_info_logout:
You are now disconnected.
Thanks you and see you next time !
alerts_invitations_group_accept: You are now a member of the group {{groupName}}.
alerts_invitations_channel_accept: You are now a member of the channel {{channelName}}.
alerts_invitations_group_refuse: You refused to join the group {{groupName}}.
alerts_invitations_channel_refuse: You refused to join the channel {{channelName}}.
alerts_success_login:
Hello there {{username}} ! Welcome back on Cogeo !
Last visit {{lastLogin}}.
alerts_success_register:
Hey {{username}} !
Thank you to joined the Cogeo community !
alerts_success_update_user: Your profile changes have been saved.
alerts_success_update_user_notifications: Your notifications settings changes have been saved.
alerts_success_update_user_settings: Your settings changes have been saved.
alerts_success_update_group: Your changes on the group {{groupName}} have been saved.
alerts_success_update_channel: Your changes on the channel {{channelName}} of the group {{groupName}} have been saved.
alerts_success_post_channel: The channel {{channelName}} for the group {{groupName}} have been created !
alerts_success_send_cogeo_user_invitatio: A friend request have been sent to {{username}}
alerts_success_send_cogeo_groups_invitat: An invitation to join the group {{groupName}} have been sent to {{username}}
{{length}} invitations to join the group {{groupName}} have been sent.
alerts_success_send_email_groups_invitat: An email to join the group {{groupName}} have been sent to {{email}}.
{{length}} emails to join the group {{groupName}} have been sent.
alerts_success_joined_group: You are now a member of the group {{groupName}}.
alerts_success_leaved_group: You are not longer a member of the group {{groupName}}.
alerts_success_joined_channel: You are not a member of the channel {{channelName}} of group {{groupName}}.
alerts_success_leaved_channel: You are not longer a member of the channel {{channelName}} of group {{groupName}}.
alerts_success_user_kick: You have kicked {{username}} from group {{groupName}} for {{time}}.
alerts_success_user_grant: You have granted {{username}} from group {{groupName}} to admin member.
alerts_success_user_revoke: You have revoked {{username}} from group {{groupName}} of admin member list.
alerts_success_user_channel_kick: You have kicked {{username}} from channel {{channelName}} of group {{groupName}} for {{time}}.
alerts_success_user_channel_ban: You have banned {{username}} from channel {{channelName}} of group {{groupName}}.
alerts_success_user_channel_unban: You have unbanned {{username}} from channel {{channelName}} of group {{groupName}}.
alerts_success_user_channel_grant: You have granted {{username}} from channel {{channelName}} of group {{groupName}} to admin member.
alerts_success_user_channel_revoke: You have revoked {{username}} from channel {{channelName}} of group {{groupName}} of admin member list.
alerts_success_channel_removed: You have removed the channel {{channelName}} of group {{groupName}}.
alerts_success_friend_set_alias_empty: You have removed the nickname of {{friend}}.
alerts_success_friend_blocked: You have blocked {{friend}} from your friends.
alerts_success_friend_unblocked: You have unblocked {{friend}} from your friends.
alerts_success_friend_remove: You have removed {{friend}} from your friends.
alerts_error_get_mediaStream: You can't start a call. You must authorize Cogeo to use your microphone and your camera.
